pages.text: A devastating sigil that calls down heaven's judgment. Enemies are lifted skyward before being slammed back to earth with deadly force.

pages.title: Mechanics
pages.text: $(bold)Activation:$() Right-click$(br)$(bold)LP Cost:$() 1,000 LP$(br)$(bold)Range:$() 16 blocks$(br2)All enemies within range receive $(effect)Levitation II$() for 3 seconds with an additional upward velocity boost. After the effect ends, they are slammed downward.

pages.title: Fall Damage
pages.text: $(bold)Heavy Heart:$() Targets receive Blood Magic's $(effect)Heavy Heart$() effect for 2 seconds, preventing flight.$(br2)$(bold)Velocity Scaling:$() Flying creatures or those already high up receive stronger downward velocity based on their height from ground.$(br2)$(italic)What goes up must come down... violently.$()
